subtitle: Serve with a dollop of fromage frais.

method.text: Mix together the flour and sugar in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre and beat in the egg and milk to give a smooth batter. Then mix in the lemon rind and sultanas.

Heat a little oil in a non-stick frying pan. Tip the pan to coat then pour out any excess. Spread 60 ml of batter into rounds in the pan and cook at a low heat for 2-3 min until bubbles rise to the surface of the pancake and burst.
Flip over the pancakes with a palette knife and cook until golden. Keep the pancakes warm while cooking the remaining batter.

title: Sultana citrus pancakes
